name: Sunflora
description: It converts sunlight into energy. In the darkness after sunset, it closes its petals and becomes still.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during strong sunlight.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.effect: During strong sunlight, this Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack but takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage after each turn.
abilities.description: Boosts Sp. Atk, but lowers HP in sunshine.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's remaining sleep turn count falls by 2 rather than 1.  If this Pokémon's sleep counter is at 1, it will fall to 0 and then the Pokémon will wake up.
